3: So, Commandant, what brings you to the workshop?

2: Remember that tiny robot you gave me...?
4: O-oh, nothing. I was just looking around...

3: Not surprised. After all, it was assembled out of recycled Corrupted parts dating back to the last century...
It's about at the end of its life expectancy anyway.
Did you bring it? I'll run some tests on it.
I've replaced some of the scrapped parts. But the core chip is too old, and the workshop doesn't have any spares.

2: Do we have to go kill more Corrupted?

3: We can't get this type of chip from dismantling Corrupted. However...
If you really can't go without it...
I know where we can buy one.

4: I'll go get one right now!

3: Don't get your hopes up just yet. Do you know what kind of chip?
Wait a second. You know what kind of chip to buy?

4: Can't you just go with me?

3: Constructs can only leave if we're on a mission. You'll need to submit an application to your superior if you want me to go with you. Are you sure?

2: If that's what it takes for you to go with me.
4: I don't have any other choice.
